title: Brody's Ghost Volume 4
description: Brody's racing against time to uncover the identity of the serial killer known as the Penny Murderer before he claims his next Brody's ex-girlfriend, Nicole. But he's also found out that Talia, the ghost who set him on this road to justice, has been lying to him from the start - and if that's not enough, Nicole has a new guy who seems just a little too good to be true...
author: Mark Crilley
